Privilegios_01:
-- Comando simples para ver todas as entradas de privilégios futuros
SELECT 
    n.nspname AS schema_name,
    r.rolname AS owner_role,
    pg_get_userbyid(a.grantee) AS grantee_role,
    a.privilege_type,
    t.defaclobjtype AS obj_type
FROM 
    pg_default_acl t
    JOIN pg_roles r ON t.defaclrole = r.oid
    JOIN pg_namespace n ON t.defaclnamespace = n.oid,
    LATERAL aclexplode(t.defaclacl) AS a
WHERE 
    n.nspname = 'Teste_001_Esquema' 
    AND t.defaclobjtype = 'r';  -- 'r' para tabelas
001:
SELECT
  n.nspname                   AS schema,
  d.defaclobjtype            AS objtype,
  d.defaclrole::regrole      AS owner,       -- owner cujos objetos futuros herdarão
  d.defaclacl                AS acl_raw
FROM pg_default_acl d
JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = d.defaclnamespace
WHERE d.defaclobjtype = 'r'
ORDER BY n.nspname, owner;
